summary: A test suite dedicated to validating the Pix2Struct vision model implementation, adapting generic model tests to account for its unique input handling (no input IDs, embeddings, attention mask, or sequence length) and verifying configuration, forward behavior, attribute integrity, pretrained loading, gradient handling, fast initialization, and training features including gradient checkpointing.
business_intent: Ensure the Pix2Struct vision model functions correctly across configuration, inference, training, and serialization scenarios, providing confidence that the model adheres to expected behavior despite its specialized input schema.
